thread.title: "You are an adulterer": Kim Woodburn screams at topless Jamie O'Hara as security drag her out of CBB house
thread.title_full: "You are an adulterer": Kim Woodburn screams at topless Jamie O'Hara as security drag her out of CBB house

author: Vicki Newman
title: "You are an adulterer": Kim Woodburn screams at topless Jamie O'Hara as security drag her out of CBB house
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn was held back by security as she screamed at a topless Jamie O'Hara calling him an "adulterer". 
The How Clean Is Your House star, 74, was dragged out of the Celebrity Big Brother house, but not before she told the 30-year-old footballer exactly what she thinks of him. 
Viewers will see Kim embroiled in an explosive and foul-mouthed argument with Jamie and fellow housemate Nicola McLean on tonight's show. 
Things take a very nasty turn when Kim shouts at Jamie: "Go away, you adulterer." Read More Kim didn't hold back her feelings 
Jamie retorts by calling her an "absolute disgrace", which only seems to anger her more. 
Kim is held back by a female security guard as she pushes her way towards Jamie, screaming: "And you're an adulterer." 
She tries to push the security guard out of the way, saying "'scuse me", before continuing her rant. 
"And you're an adulterer who two-timed your wife and she's got three kids. You're talking about decency. Oh, come on darling." Kim is held back by security (Photo: Channel 5) 
Fans will see the entire argument unfold tonight. 
It sees Kim screaming at footballer Jamie O'Hara after he leaps to the defence of Nicola - or Nicole as Kim has branded her. 
Kim tells Nicola that she was threatened when Kim came into the house. Stacy tells Kim that things are “cool” so doesn’t need to go over things. “You’re making things worse,” Chloe tells Kim. Kim continues to talk over Nicola. 
In the Diary Room Kim tells Big Brother that Nicola has a “hold” on the housemates. “The mafia won’t break me down,” she warns. She was removed from the house (Photo: Channel 5) 
Some of the Housemates are getting ready for bed. Calum says goodnight to Kim and from her bed, Bianca tells him not to be a “kiss arse.” 
Kim says it’s been “delightful, all the f**king people I’m living with here.” Kim tells “those girls” not to start, “I’ll cross you so badly you’ll regret it for the rest of your life.” 
Nicola enters the bedroom and tells Kim not to “come” for Bianca. “Mother bunny,” Kim quips. Kim adds that they won’t get the better of her. “I don’t’ want to, I feel sorry for you.” Jamie wasn't happy (Photo: Channel 5) 
Nicola goes into the Diary Room and tells Big Brother she would like to go home. 
Kim says that Nicola is “a horrible girl” who is leading the house. Jamie repeats: “How is she horrible, you’re over dramatic.” 
Kim continues to rage at the housemates, “You’re a two-faced bunch, chicken-livered s**ts.” Jamie calls after Kim but she shuts him down, “You're another one you chicken-livered bugger.” Things got very heated (Photo: Channel 5) 
Jamie gets out of bed and follows Kim into the living area shouting: “Who the f**k are you talking to?” adding: “You’re a disgrace, you are nasty, you are vile,” as Spencer and Stacy try to calm him down. 
Security enters the house and separates the group. Kim tells housemates they are “a bunch of chinless wonders.” Jamie tells Kim she is a “bully” who has come in the house and “picked on young girls.” 
*Celebrity Big Brother is on Channel 5 tonight at 9pm
